description: Try our easy to follow Green Beans With Almonds recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Green Beans With Almonds Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Return to the pan with butter and season with salt and pepper. Shake pan over the heat for 2-3 minutes to reheat beans and coat with the butter. Add almonds and toss to combine. Transfer to a warmed serving dish.
